__Test Case__@kidsOtp__1: KidsOtp - [SC01] Verify if the parent has the option to set the mobile number for a child whose EID status is VALID
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__2: KidsOtp - [SC02] Verify the elements on Receive OTP Overlay screen
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__3: KidsOtp - [SC03] Verify if error message is displayed by entering invalid mobile number in Receive OTP Overlay screen
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__4: KidsOtp - [SC04] Verify if the mobile number duplication error is displayed by entering an existing number for the child
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__5: KidsOtp - [SC05] Verify the elements on Confirm OTP Overlay screen
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__6[Replace/Reset]: KidsOtp - [SC06] Verify if the parent is able to set the mobile number for a child whose EID status is VALID
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__7: KidsOtp - [SC07] Verify if the parent does not have option to set the mobile number for a child whose EID status is not VALID
__Test Case__@kidsOtp__8: KidsOtp - [SC08] Verify if the parent is able to edit the mobile number for a child whose EID status is VALID
__Test Case__@kidsDocuments__1: kidsDocuments - [SC01] Verify if expected documents for child can be viewed by the Father in case child's debit card is delivered
__Test Case__@kidsDocuments__2: kidsDocuments - [SC02] Verify if documents section is not present for child in case my child's debit card is not delivered
__Test Case__@kidsDocuments__3: kidsDocuments - [SC03] Verify if documents section is not present for child in case my child is a marketplace user
__Test Case__@kidsDocuments__4,5: kidsDocuments - [SC04] Verify if expected documents for child can be viewed by the Mother in case child's debit card is delivered
__Test Case__@kidsDocuments__5,4: kidsDocuments - [SC05] Verify if option to open or download documents for child appears by tapping on each documents
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__1: kycUpdate - [SC01] Verify if Emirates ID details and update option is present in Profile details screen for a user whose EID status is Valid
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__2: kycUpdate - [SC02] Verify if the user is redirected to EID scan screen by tapping on Update Emirates ID option from Profile details screen
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__3: kycUpdate - [SC03] Verify if the Expiry banner is displayed for user whose Emirates ID is expiring and tapping on the banner will take the user to Scan EID screen
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__4: kycUpdate - [SC04] Verify if the Expiry banner is displayed for user whose Emirates ID is expired and tapping on the banner will take the user to Scan EID screen
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__5: kycUpdate - [SC05] Verify if expiry banner is displayed in family tab for a child whose EID is expiring and tapping on the banner will take the user to Scan EID screen
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__6: kycUpdate - [SC06] Verify if expiry banner is displayed in family tab for a child whose EID is expired and tapping on the banner will take the user to Scan EID screen
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__7: kycUpdate - [SC07] Verify if Emirates ID details and update option is present in settings screen for a child whose EID status is Valid
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__8: kycUpdate - [SC08] Verify if Emirates ID details and update option is not present in settings screen for a child whose EID status is not Valid
__Test Case__@kycUpdate__9: kycUpdate - [SC09] Verify if Emirates ID details and update option is not present in Profile details screen for a user whose EID status is not Valid
